title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
content: A fad is  trend. And a trend is something that everyone talks about or does for a short while after which they move on to the next happening thing. I remember many years ago wetin been dey trend then na say, you wan be doctor, engineer, lawyer. After that one na oil company work come dey trend. Everybody been wan work for oil company. After that one na come government job. Everybody wan get government job. After that one na tech. Everybody one do tech. Now wetin dey trend na Japa. If you don join the Japa trend before, you go Sabi say e dey very expensive and second e dey hard to even secure interview date.For Naija, all of us sabi at least 2 persons wey don Japa. Some sef go tell you when them don reach because say na you be winch wey fit stop them(Sarcasm intended). I nor talk say Japa nor good or bad but we the stories wey dem dey sell give us no complete. Pipo wey dey enjoy this Japa thing na skilled workers o doctors, software engineers, Nurses. Unskilled people na Dem dey suffer pass and na Dem dey sell all their property to take Japa. Only to go there go suffer. I nor dey judge Dem.The question wey I wan ask una be say, wetin una think say go be the next trend after this Japa thing pass?https://nairametrics.com/2023/09/02/japa-is-it-wise-to-sell-off-your-properties-to-relocate-abroad/

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Omo na oda tin wey me no fit cap as e be now because everi tim na so we dey get new trends wey go dey float for we country after Sapa naim we get this japa. But make we tell ourselves de truth be say, dis country na one kind funny place wey be say pesin no fit afford to lose, usually me like 9ja and na free place to move around but if man no use sense dem go use pesin sense.9ja be like bicycle whahala no dey finish, the more we keep going de we see new things inside we country.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: First I want talk say you no mention the graduate parol levels. Like e get when e be say for naija if you never enter university or poly, you never begin and because of that almost every family get one graduate there.Well the japa level unto another trend wey go follow am, hmmm me I see say the level go be when we go begin see deportees. Like time go come wey some men go dey use their hand go airport say dem want come back unto say suffer go still dey there when people don full for mouth and the economy don dey over stretched. South Africa now dey face dat kind of situation as men don dey leave dere because of hardship and infrastructures wey don dey drop.

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: I swear everyone want to japa leave naija empty. Since those things wey you mentioned e don fall. There was a time na Yahoo come dey reign like tomorrow e no dey and everyone wants to make money, boys dey come dey run for street like mad people. Omen those guys create dramas in naija streets oohh. And because there is no job anywhere as they think would happen after the graduation, everyone hustle to survive on the street and those who could not do the agboro work join others for survival. And for now nobody value education again. And the tin wey go Happened after dis Japa matter na bitcoin trending. Everyone go like to join bitcoin investment if proper orientation is giving to them. People like us wey no sabi any skills na here we dey. We no even know where to japa go sef. If we do sef dem go deport us come dat day. So there is no need for us to even go. Oboy those people we japa and succeed dey make well. But when dem catch you, you go hear am be dat. So make we pray say, make our government do well for di country so dat Japa e no go dey again because if you loss guide for there, you own don go be dat.

comments.author: Promocodeudo
comments.body: The hardship, inability to get something doing, instability in the country, government anti-peoples policy and the weakness of our currency have pushed people to this extent of wanting to japa at every possible opportunity, Despite the stress they encounter during the visa processing, people don't care anymore, what matters to them, is that, they want to japa, in this era, people see education as a waste of time because graduates are everywhere in the country unemployed, in this case, some family go to extra mind to borrow fund for there children to japa, so that things will get well as soon as they start getting money, our leaders have disappointed us so much, so the option for now is japa for some people, but I believe, Nigeria will be great again it may not be now but it must surely come to fulfillment.

comments.author: EluguHcman
comments.body: The trend word "jakpa" come gain ground when we country 9ja com dey be unbearable and intolerant bcos life na jst 1 to be gambled with way come make we dey live life by troubleshooting for survival from 1 point to another til ewe even feel the least country go beta pass ours.We feel to jakpa out of towns or 9ja bcus time no dey again. If u no help urself nobody go help so no time to waste. We all dey find beta life so we gears up to find this beta life anywhere at all e dey na why this jakpa dey trend and e no go fade til our economic system com to give us a beta living where the  we go see this country a beta place to beta our precious lives.As for next trending word, that one a future term way no body knows. Na present situations on ground dey fumes what to trend.

People dy wey no get family or helper, na them after them na why them dy do anything to run comot.

comments.body: I feel say the next big thing na crypto still. Even those wey dey Japa know say na to go crypto accepted country sure pass. The country situation is tiring as it is already. Same old jobs, same old courses, same old skills, same old politicians, same old schemes. If anyone has a skill they have been honing and have limited access to the resources needed to master and earn from that skill here; why the person no go Japa?Na so person star dey begin shine o!

comments.author: Victorybit1
comments.body: As ona dey japa make ona  know say e no easy for there. It's not how we think am or as we dey see for  film. If you don't have a bankable skill or a good profession I won't advise anyone to japa. You cannot meet up with taxes and bills payment  cos the cost of living there is also expensive. You can work remotely from your own country and still earn dollars just by using your skills.Before making the decision japa to any country with your skills or profession, it's important to research the specific place  conditions, requirements, and potential challenges. Additionally, seeking advice from people wey don already make the move, e go help you get valuable insight.
